title: JAM ORB / pagetwothought
description: A conversation with EletroChem that encourages you to commit an act of public indecency for Superstar point

dialogueTree.title: Electrochemistry: "That page-three girl... she must be..."
dialogueTree.text: That page-three girl... she must be *the* most beautiful page-three girl ever printed. And look at those freckles! The origin of disco... makes you wanna dive into the boogie, doesn't it? Get closer to disco itself with Miss Page-Three.

links.title: Rhetoric: "L'origine du disco! Such a powerful..."
links.text: L'origine du disco! Such a powerful conceit, and this is what we're going to do with it? The commitment of an act of gross public indecency?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It'd be indecent to ignore Miss Pag..."
links.text: It'd be indecent to ignore Miss Page-Three. Beauty is inviting you on a pilgrimage!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A pilgrimage you can make with just..."
links.text: A pilgrimage you can make with just your hand.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "C'mon! Beauty is inviting you on a..."
links.text: C'mon! Beauty is inviting you on a pilgrimage. A pilgrimage you can make with just your hand.

links.title: You: "Hold on, is this what happens when..."
links.text: Hold on, is this what happens when you two get together?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Yes!"
links.text: Yes!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Sure is!"
links.text: Sure is!

links.title: You: "Hm... How *exactly* can I travel to..."
links.text: Hm... How *exactly* can I travel to the origin of disco with Miss Page-Three?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Oh, come on. Don't say you've forgo..."
links.text: Oh, come on. Don't say you've forgotten *that* as well. You can *feel* what you wanna do. You wanna party, don't you? Party right now with Miss Page-Three. *Unzip* and party.

links.title: You: "Hang on. Right now? Unzip?"
links.text: Hang on. Right now? Unzip?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "That's exactly what I mean. Unzip a..."
links.text: That's exactly what I mean. Unzip and party down on yourself, my man. No one's watching.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Except Miss Page-Three, of course."
links.text: Except Miss Page-Three, of course.

links.title: You: "But Kim..."
links.text: But Kim...

links.title: You: "Go on..."
links.text: Go on...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Look at her thighs, *between* her t..."
links.text: Look at her thighs, *between* her thighs, and... what are you waiting for, man?!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "PARTY WITH MISS PAGE-THREE ALL THE..."
links.text: PARTY WITH MISS PAGE-THREE ALL THE WAY TO DISCO ZERO!

links.title: You: "Yes! This is just like how it'll be..."
links.text: Yes! This is just like how it'll be in the End Times -- only me and Miss Page-Three. (Start unzipping.)

links.title: Inland Empire: "... is what you're thinking. But yo..."
links.text: ... is what you're thinking. But you don't want to party down. Not really. Not in the deepest part of your soul, where the freckles only make you sad.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Come on, what are you talking about..."
links.text: Come on, what are you talking about -- sad freckles? Freckles are fun!

links.title: You: "Why do I hurt all of a sudden?"
links.text: Why do I hurt all of a sudden?

links.title: Inland Empire: "The furnace has long been cold, des..."
links.text: The furnace has long been cold, despite itself. You're too sad to jerk off. This is not the first time this has happened, either.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Then it is truly over. You are beyo..."
links.text: Then it is truly over. You are beyond the help of the page-three girl. You are truly doomed.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "COME ON! I SAID PARTY!"
links.text: COME ON! I SAID PARTY!

links.title: You: "(Party.)"
links.text: (Party.)

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Fucking right. Let me just tighten..."
links.text: Fucking right. Let me just tighten up a bit for you -- is that good, you sick, wild fuck boy?

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The usually unflappable lieutenant..."
links.text: The usually unflappable lieutenant takes a surprised step back. "Officer... what are you doing?"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "I DIDN'T SAY PARTY THIS SECOND!"
links.text: I DIDN'T SAY PARTY THIS SECOND!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Party later. Party in *private*. Li..."
links.text: Party later. Party in *private*. Like you would if you ever prayed.

links.title: You: ""I, uh... had to zip *up* my fly. T..."
links.text: "I, uh... had to zip *up* my fly. That's all. Let's move on." [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "Oh, right. Of course... [Finish tho..."
links.text: Oh, right. Of course... [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "Yeah... I want to get into the groo..."
links.text: Yeah... I want to get into the groovy. Let's disco, baby. (Start unzipping.)

links.title: Inland Empire: "... is what you're thinking. But yo..."
links.text: ... is what you're thinking. But you don't want to disco like this. Not really. Not in the deepest part of your soul, where the freckles only make you sad.

links.title: You: "I don't think so... there's just so..."
links.text: I don't think so... there's just something uncomfortable about all of this.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Fuck. Fuuuuuuuuuck! But it's the or..."
links.text: Fuck. Fuuuuuuuuuck! But it's the origin of all disco, buddy! Why not?

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Come ON, *bratan*! YOU'RE SO CLOSE..."
links.text: Come ON, *bratan*! YOU'RE SO CLOSE TO DISCO! TAKE IT OUT AND JACK IT!

links.title: You: "There's more to the freckled woman..."
links.text: There's more to the freckled woman than what you're suggesting. There's more to disco, too. And to me.

links.title: Inland Empire: "And more than that: you're sad. The..."
links.text: And more than that: you're sad. There's an absence inside of you, something missing that may have been freckled too.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Whatever, coward. Don't ride your w..."
links.text: Whatever, coward. Don't ride your way to the origin of disco. The page-three girl is too good for you anyway.

links.title: You: "Because she's the kind of pretty th..."
links.text: Because she's the kind of pretty that gets me down.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You're right. There's an absence in..."
links.text: You're right. There's an absence inside of you, something missing that may have been freckled too.

links.title: You: "... I don't want to masturbate on t..."
links.text: ... I don't want to masturbate on the street, okay?

links.title: You: "Should I invite Kim to travel to th..."
links.text: Should I invite Kim to travel to the origin disco with me?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Absolutely not."
links.text: Absolutely not.

links.title: You: "No. This is not how I want to remem..."
links.text: No. This is not how I want to remember the freckled girl. [Finish thought.]
